initMessages: Next, you will find a combination of gates.
name: Digital circuit

texts.and: AND: This gate results in 1 when both its inputs are 1.
texts.or: OR: This gate results in 1 when at least one of its inputs is 1.
texts.xor: XOR: This gate results in 1 when its two inputs are different.
texts.nand: NAND: This gate results in 0 when its two inputs are 1.
texts.nor: NOR: This gate results in 0 when at least one of its inputs is 1.
